poem.title: countably infinite
poem.author: Chris Doyle, The Omnificent English Dictionary In Limerick Form

stanza.line: Is as simple as things like this get.
I'll check back when you're done, so don't sweat.

introduction.p: In this chapter we will consider some basic concepts of the relations that are called functions. A large variety of mathematical ideas and applications can be more completely understood when expressed through the function concept.
